blockchain.name: Lustrous
blockchain.desc:
"In a world inhabited by crystalline lifeforms called The Lustrous, every unique gem must fight for their way of life against the threat of lunarians who would turn them into decorations." – Land of the Lustrous

Author: minaminao (DeFiHackLabs)

crypto.name: BrokenShare
crypto.desc:
I implemented another secret sharing this year, but it doesn’t recover the flag correctly. Can you help me fix it and recover the flag?

crypto.desc:
LCG is fun, ECDSA is fun too, so why not combine them together?

Like a star in the sky, gleamering, remembering all the things we've done.

crypto.desc:
I don’t know how to design a secure stream cipher, but a large key space should be sufficient to block most attacks right?

Author: bronson113

crypto.name: ZKPoF
crypto.desc:
I will use zero-knowledge proof to prove the knowledge for the factorization of n=p*q, so you wouldn’t be able to learn anything from it.

misc.desc:

pwn.desc:

Author: pumpkin

pwn.name: Seccomp Hell
pwn.desc:
Some challenges are userland pwns, others are kernel pwn, still others are sandbox escapes.
In Seccomp Hell, you can get all three for free <3

Note: Try getting a full root shell for this challenge

Author: wxrdnx

pwn.name: V8 SBX
pwn.desc:
Oh, another V8 heap sandbox escape challenge.
But this time, we don't need you to search for sandbox-related fixes and create a n-day exploit.

Note: You can login as root.

web.name: RClonE
web.desc:
Rclone is a CLI that syncs your files to various files to cloud storage. But do you know it also have a built-in web UI?
